Name: Check Online Service Nodes
Description: Check online service nodes, which can provide available web service

Name: Check Service Node State
Description: Check service node state, which is online or offline

Params.Name: token
Params.Description: The specific unique identifier of one specific service node

Return: Check specific service node state including online and offline state.

Name: Check Available Services Of Node
Description: Check service node state, which is online or offline

Params.Name: token
Params.Description: The specific unique identifier of one specific service node

Params.Name: type
Params.Description: The service type of one specific service node, including information, visualization and data service, optional parameter: Processing, Visualization and Data

Return: Check specific service node state including online and offline state.
